Traits.Name: Defiance
Traits.Description: Prevents hit points from being reduced past 1 hp. When this triggers, remove this effect.

Traits.Name: Prowl
Traits.Description: Gains stealth at the start of their turn.

Traits.Name: Phase Slip
Traits.Description: After being damaged for the first time in a turn (any turn), become intangible until the start of the following turn.
